Procedure.name: spCheckPlayerIdExists
spLoginPlayer
Procedure.Body: DECLARE @result INT; IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [dbo].[Player] WHERE [playerId] = @playerId) BEGIN SET @result = 2; END ELSE BEGIN IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [dbo].[Player] WHERE [playerId] = @playerId AND [playerPassword] = @playerPassword) BEGIN SET @result = 1; END ELSE BEGIN SET @result = 0; END END SELECT @result AS 'LoginResult';
